creator: hubertus@groepper.com
text:
Lenya is available in various binary and source distributions, and it may be difficult to choose the "right" 
one. The following patches add some more information to the website.

Created attachment 15334
Provide direct download links on project homepage

This patch provides links to all available distributions of the current stable
release right at the homepage. It removes the single download link at the top
of the page.
creator: hubertus@groepper.com

text:
Created attachment 15335
Lists all download options and adds some more information

This patches 1_2_x/installation/index.html to add more info and the same
download listing as on the homepage.
creator: hubertus@groepper.com
hubertus@groepper.com
text:
Created attachment 15336
Add nightly builds (link) to download 1.4 section

Very minor change to 1_4/installation/index.html to add nightly builds.

creator: gregor@apache.org
text: thanks, applied. they will go live with the next site update
